text: Before pass 2: Say we had found m frequent singleton itemsets after pass 1. (m= 2 could be reasonable.) 100 Create new array (frequent singletons table), indexed 1 to n, where « non-frequent items are mapped to 0, and « each frequent item is mapped to a unique integer between 1 and m. In main memory: « Hash table (item names to integers in range 1 to n) + Frequent singletons table
